field.name: summary
field.value: Chicken and egg problem when trying to inherit from DefaultDependencyResolver

field.name: description
field.value:
DefaultKernel lets you pass custom IDependencyResolver as one of its .ctor arguments but DefaultDependencyResolver gets IKernel as its .ctor argument. This means that I can't reuse it when I want to create a custom one and I have to start implementing the interface from scratch, even if I only want to override a small piece of it.
Those two should be decoupled.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: This fix introduced a breaking change. see breakingchanges.txt for details
